changes: Added focus-ring class to 'Group by Facility' toggle button
Added focus-visible styles to FacilityGroup header button

patterns_discovered: Consistent use of Tailwind CSS utility classes for focus styling
Dynamic className generation based on state
gotchas_discovered: Not all interactive elements initially had consistent focus-visible styles
Ensuring keyboard navigation visibility across different components
Button styles differ based on state
Hover and focus states need to be manually managed

approach_outcome.goal: Add focus-visible styles to collapsible FacilityGroup header button

recommendations: Complete focus-visible implementation across all interactive components
Create comprehensive keyboard navigation accessibility test suite
Perform WCAG 2.1 Level AA compliance audit
Extract common button styling into reusable utility classes
Validate accessibility of focus styles with screen readers
